echo-category-title-notification-bs-remi: Message to display on user preferences for notifications
notification-bs-reminder-one-week-subjec: Subject of email notification to remember article when it is due one week from today. $1 - the title of the article
notification-bs-reminder-one-week-email-: Body of email notification to remember article when it is due one week from now. $1 - title of the article\n $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-one-week-web-bo: Body of web notification to remember article when it is due one week from now. $1 - title of the article
notification-bs-reminder-today-subject: Subject of email notification to remember article when it is due today $1 - the title of the article
notification-bs-reminder-today-email-bod: Body of email notification to remember article when it is due today. $1 - the title of the article\n $2 - the comment of the reminder
notification-bs-reminder-today-web-body: Body of web notification to remember article when it is due today. $1 - the title of the article
